viewData.name: Skin Candy Anti Spots 10ml 9pcs
viewData.short_description: Skin candy anti spots is an advanced cream intended for skincare after treating skin issues like skin spots, acne scars and inflammations or other kind of pigmentation spots, as it deeply acts on the skin surface, making┬á its tone more even. It is a powerful blend of skin resurfacing ingredients that help skin texture rebalance, reducing pigmentations, acne blemishes, scars and spots, as well as calming current inflammations.
viewData.long_description: Natural origin active ingredients like stilbenes from rhubarb root extract and┬á licorice extract, slightly lighten skin spots, and have a strong effect on redness, resulting with more even complexion. The herbal extracts enriched formula improves circulation and has antiseptic effect.
